## store delete

Delete stores

```
store delete [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --address string      Server to connect in the cluster (default "127.0.0.1")
  -h, --help                help for delete
      --port int32          Port to use for communication (default 9191)
      --store-name string   Name of the store to delete
```
